text:
One sees contact info (mailing lists), and Bug Reporting on
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/
but once one enters
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.4/
they are all gone.
Not even in the
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.4/sitemap.html
What makes this worse is
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.4/
is what is packaged as offline docs e.g.,
apache2-doc of Debian.
Anyway, you have 95% of the docs with no contact information,
and no way to report bugs.
Contact information should always be in the footer of each page,
as should bug reporting, or at least somewhere in
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.4/developer/ .
creator: jidanni@jidanni.org
